title: Retro Game SFX Pack - Designed
description: A collection of sound effects made in a classic retro game style, designed with added processing, contains 150 sounds for collections, lasers, jumps, magic spells, danger, enemies, computers, damage, launch, ui sounds, upgrades, victory and more.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/retro-game-sfx-pack-designed

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/4l142neh1kfuyvq/MSE%20-%20Retro%20Game%20SFX%20Pack%20-%20Designed_v1.0.pdf?dl=0


A collection of sound effects made in a classic retro game style, designed with added processing, contains 150 sounds.Â 


The package includes sounds for collections, coin picking, jumps, alarms and danger, bosses and enemies, checkpoints, damage and hits, defeat, explosions, laser shots, destruction, disintegration sounds, evil, magic spells, escapes, double effects, game over, level ends, level ups, immortality, upgrades, pause, ui sounds, buttons, notifications, thunder, reborn sounds, run, power ups, shut downs, thunders, success, denied, victory and more.


This package will sound great in your classic retro game, but don't be afraid to experiment with these sound effects in games of other genres.


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 111 retro-style sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • great for classic retro and pixel games


Number of Audio Waves: 111

Number of Audio Cues: 111

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 03 minutes 49 seconds

Supported Development Platforms:

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
